name: 'Death Run VR' - Game-A-Week 'X2 Sequel' Experience Prototype
name_original: 'Death Run VR' - Game-A-Week 'X2 Sequel' Experience Prototype
description: This is my group project "Death Run VR" as part of "X2 Sequel" week of my Game-A-Week university project. This is a virtual reality multiplayer experience, as a VR set (HTC Vive recommended) and an extra player on the computer is needed.
